description: The BR-30 Regional Transport Office (DTO) serves the Sitamarhi district of Bihar, acting as the primary hub for vehicle registration and licensing under the Tirhut Division. Located in the administrative center of Dumra, it plays a vital role in regulating transport for this Indo-Nepal border region, facilitating local transit and commercial vehicle operations. The office is responsible for revenue collection through road taxes and ensuring the enforcement of the Motor Vehicles Act across its vast rural and urban jurisdiction.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Dumra, Sitamarhi, Bihar
